summary.para: Contains driver-specific data for the method.

remarks.para: The exact meaning of each structure member depends on the value of Function.

summary.para: The function number. This number identifies the operation to perform. Currently no function numbers are defined.
A pointer to a buffer that contains input data for the driver.
The size of the pPrivateInputData buffer, in bytes.
A pointer to a buffer that the driver can use to write output data.
The size of the pPrivateOutputData buffer, in bytes.
The number of elements in the ppResourceList array. If ppResourceList is NULL, set ResourceCount to zero.
The address of an array of pointers. Use this member to pass Direct3D resources to the driver.
